verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
[Verse 1]
Lord of all the earth
How You care for me
You have made me
You will save
And carry me always

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
You are faithful
You are faithful
You are faithful
Your joy is my strength

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[Verse 2]
Lord You are my guide
I rely on You
I put my hope in things not seen
Your promises all true

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
You are faithful
You are faithful
You are faithful
Your joy is my strength

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You are faithful
You are faithful
You are faithful
Your joy is my strength

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
[Bridge]
Always You're with me
Your hand will lead me
My trust is in Your Name

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Always You're with me
Your hand will lead me
My trust is in Your Name
